metadata.feature_description: Search posts by keywords, tags, and authors with advanced filtering options

steps.action: Navigate to Publisher module on News page
steps.expected: Publisher module displays with search box and filters
steps.actual: Publisher module displayed with search box, Authors filter, Featured and Latest posts sections

steps.action: Enter 'Workflow' in search box and press Enter
steps.actual: Two posts returned: 'Workflow Test Post - Claude Testing' and 'Test Workflow Post - Submit for Review'. URL updated to ?text=Workflow

steps.action: Click on 'Test User2' in Authors filter section
steps.expected: Posts filtered to show only Test User2's posts
steps.actual: Only one post displayed by Test User2. 'Viewing: Test User2 x' indicator appeared. URL updated to ?author=7

steps.action: With author filter active, enter 'test' in search box
steps.expected: Results filtered by both author AND search term
steps.actual: Post matching both filters displayed. URL shows ?author=7&text=test. Both filters visible in UI

steps.action: Click on 'News' breadcrumb link to clear filters
steps.expected: All filters cleared, full post list restored
steps.actual: URL returned to /en-us/News (no query parameters). Both Featured and Latest posts displayed. No 'Viewing' section shown
'Your search returned no results' message displayed with empty state placeholder graphic

steps.expected: Special characters handled safely without errors or XSS
steps.actual: Search executed successfully. Special characters properly URL-encoded (?text=%3Ctest%3E%20%26%20%22special%22). Results returned for 'test' keyword match. No XSS vulnerability observed

steps.action: Look for Tags filter section in UI
steps.expected: Tags filter section visible with selectable tags
steps.actual: No Tags filter section found in UI. Only Authors filter is visible

issues: Tags filter UI element not visible on Publisher page despite TagsFilterManager.js existing in code

steps.action: Look for Tags filter section to select multiple tags
steps.expected: Ability to select multiple tags for filtering
steps.actual: Tags filter section not found in UI

issues: Tags filter UI element not visible - cannot test multi-tag filtering

steps.action: Look for date range filter controls in UI
steps.expected: Date range picker or filter options available
steps.actual: No date range filter found in UI or code

issues: Date range filtering feature not implemented in current Publisher version

steps.action: Look for sorting options in search results
steps.expected: Sorting options available (by date, title, etc.)
steps.actual: No sorting UI controls found. Posts appear in default order (most recent first)

issues: Sorting controls not available in Publisher UI

steps.action: Verify pagination behavior with search results
steps.expected: Pagination or 'Load More' appears when results exceed page size
steps.actual: Only 2 published posts exist in test environment. Code review confirms pagination via 'Load More' button exists (CardViewManager.js loadMore function). Feature works as designed for current data set

observations: Code suggests Tags filter feature exists (TagsFilterManager.js, TagsFilter.ascx) but no Tags section visible in UI - may require posts with tags to display
Date range filtering is NOT implemented in the current Publisher module code
Sorting options are NOT available in the Publisher UI - posts display in server default order
Author filtering works well with 'Viewing' indicator showing active filters
Search supports URL query parameters for bookmarkable/shareable filtered views
Special characters are properly encoded and handled safely
